intro: [WRONG START] Astellia cunninghamii, commonly known as the silver fern, is a striking evergreen plant native to New Zealand. It features a rosette of narrow, silver-white leaves that give it a distinctive appearance. The plant produces striking red or orange flowers that bloom in late summer. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens. Its unique foliage and vibrant blooms make it a valuable addition to both garden and conservation settings.
